title: Giant XTC - lightweight 27.5 medium hardtail
text: Lightweight and in good condition, pleasure to ride.  Medium size - for 168cm - 178cm height riders. Deore 10 x 2 groupset, brakes upgraded to XT (hydraulic discs) - excellent stopping power.  Just serviced - new rear derailleur (damaged old one replacing tyre, not due to wear), chain and brake pads.  RockShox Recon Gold air shock.  Two sets of tyres - Vredestein Spotted Cat for off-road, and Kenda Kartridge slicks for road/commuting.

title: Titan Drone Expert
text:
I am selling my 2018 Titan Drone Expert XC hardtail MTB. The bike is in good condition and has recently had a full service done by The Bike Rack, here is the list of what was fixed/replaced.
1. Strip and service of the headset bearings 
2. Rebuilt rear hub bearings 
3. Replaced the bottom bracket 
4. Replaced and bled the brake fluid in the front and rear brakes.
5. Cable frame protection 
6. Cable management 
7. Replaced the remote lockout cable for the suspension

Below are the specs of the bike.

Frame: DRONE X6 LIGHTWEIGHT ALLOY 29R QR FRAME. Frame Size: XL

Fork: SR SF14 XCR AIR 100MM (BRONZE Stantions) REMOTE LOCKOUT

Chainweel: SHIMANO M6000 DEORE 10-SPEED 36-26T

Bottom Bracket: SHIMANO BB-52

Front Derailleur: DEORE M6000 2 X 10

Rear Derailleur: SHIMANO SLX M7000 2 X 10

Shifters: DEORE M6000 2 X 10

Brake Levers: SHIMANO M315, BLACK WITH TEKTRO ROTOR

Cassette: SHIMANO CS-HG500-10 11-42T

Rims: SUNRINGLE HELIX 25 TL

Tires: TITAN H-5161 SLEDGE PRO 29″ X 2.10″ 60TPI TUBELESS READY

Handlebar: TITAN FLAT BAR 720MM

Stem: Titan 100mm

Seat post: 31.6MM TITAN

Seat: SR-2058HRN

Headset: FSA NO.42/CUP

Chain: KMC X10

Hubset: Alloy Disc Q/R BLACK

Rotors: OEM

I am selling it for R6,000.00.

Please check it out on Bike Hub using the link below. If interested please send me a WhatsApp.

https://bikehub.co.za/classifieds/item/hardtail-mountain-bikes/615171/titan-drone-expert?

title: Trek Fuel EX5
text:
Basic still brand new and in showroom condition. Only done 536 from new. 

The Fuel EX 5 is a full-suspension trail bike that's ready to handle it all. With trail-taming 140 mm front and 130 mm rear suspension, a Shimano 1x12 drivetrain, a dropper post for getting low on descents and hydraulic disc brakes, the Fuel EX 5 hits the mark as a high-value, high-performance mountain bike with exceptional versatility.

A sturdy aluminium frame with a Knock Block steerer stop to protect against spinning bars. A 140 mm RockShox Recon Silver fork, 130 mm of rear travel with an X-Fusion Pro 2 shock, a durable 12-speed Shimano Deore drivetrain, dropper post and hydraulic disc brakes.

title: BICYCLE RACK 4 CARRIER TOW BALL MTG
text: Contact: NINO on 060 327 5223 for further assistanceThis new platform bicycle carrier has at last arrived, the rack is presently available in a 2 & 4 bike configuration, great features are the roomy wheel supports that hug the bikes tyres that are kept secure with ratchet straps, but the greatest advantage that the new rack has over most other platform type racks is the distance between the bike runner positions. No more clashing of handlebars, seats etc. The inverted U support frame is a good size so supporting 29ers in the upright position is not a problem.Features:* Stable and convenient bike carrier for 50mm tow-bar/tow-ball mounting* NO Spanner required to mount or dismount the bike carrier* The bike carrier tilts back, giving trunk access without off-loading the bikes* Folds flat for easy storage* Lockable to tow-bar* Adjustable wheel holders with soft straps for accommodating most types of bikes* Suitable for carbon frame bikes with holder attached to the seat post* Vertical frame folds flat for easy storage, compact enough to be kept in the trunk of the car* Standard big round 7-pin power plug for the light board* Carries up to 4 bikes, 60kg load capacity* 1 Year factory warranty* CE certified* Original and patented design* Weight: 15kg* Dimensions: 110cm x 77cm x 18cmSKU: 14969

title: 2019 Specialized M4 RockHOPPER 26er Mountain Bike
text:
2019 Specialized M4 RockHOPPER 26er Mountain Bike

Technical Specifications:

* Colour: Gloss Metallic Light Purple 
* Size: 15"
* Best Hardtail for any rider looking for thrills and adventure
* M4 Alloy Frame and premium specs deliver category-leading efficiency, value and dependable handling
* Headset: Specialized 1-1/8"" threadless, loose ball
* Seat Specialized Gel
* Suspension and Fork: RockShox Recon SLite, 100mm, alloy steerer, 32mm alloy stanchions
* Wheels and Rims:Specialized  445D, 26", double wall disc, pin joint w/ eyelets, 28/32h
* Rims: ALEXrims
* Front Hub: Specialized Hi Lo, forged alloy, double sealed, ground race, 28h
Rear Hub: Specialized, forged alloy, double sealed, ground race, cassette, QR, 32h
* Spokes: 1.8mm (15g) stainless
* Tyres: Specialized Fast Trak LK Control, 26x2.0"", 60TPI, aramid bead, 2 Bliss ready
* Inner Tubes: Specialized schraeder Valve
* Drivetrain Front Derailleur: Shimano Deore, 34.9mm clamp, bottom swing, dual pull
* Rear Derailleur: Deore XT Med. cage
* Shift Levers: Deore XT, 9-speed trigger
* Cassette: Shimano HG-50, 9-speed, 11-34t
* Chain: KMC X9SL w/reuseable Missing Link
* Crankset: Shimano Deore FC-M532, 2pc design, replaceable rings w/alloy outer
* Chainrings: 44A x 32S x 22S
* Bottom Braket: Shimano BB-ES25, Octalink spline, cartridge bearings, 68mm x 118mm
* Stem: Specialized 3D forged, 4-bolt, 7 degree rise, 31.8mm clamp
* Handlebars: Specialized Butted Alloy, 31.8mm, 25mm rise, 640mm wide, 8 degree back sweep, 8 degree up, 2.6mm thick
* Grips: Specialized Enduro, dual compound Kraton, no flange, 131mm
* Saddle: Specialized Indie XC, Body Geometry, 143mm width, front and rear bumpers
* Seatpost: Specialized alloy two bolt, double butted, micro adjust head, 30.9mm
* Front and Rear Brakes: Avid Juicy 3 SL Hydraulic disc, caliper/adapter w/ 160mm G2 Clean

title: ELECTRIC BIKE CONVERSIONS | E-BIKE KITS | ELECTRIC BICYCLES | CONVERT YOUR BICYCLE TO ELECTRIC
text: Electric bikes built in SA . We personalize e-bikes for people by focusing on one's desired riding experience. E-bikes individually built to satisfy different forms of adventure or exercise. Custom-built E-bikes designed for Farm roads,beaches,sand dunes, mountains or road. And the conversion of existing bicycles to electric to ensure the perfect combination of comfort and power to optimize your riding performance.Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.E-bikes built one at a time to ensure each person's individual needs are met for :1. Type of terrain.2. Torque.3. Speed.4. Range.5. Frame size.6. Weight.7. Riding preferences .Specialized e-bikes built for different types of exploration and performance - Fishing adventures, coastal beach riding, mountains and river beds, farm jeep tracks, forest trails , downhill , single tracks . Whether it's a hardtail or soft tail full susp our team custom-builds e-bikes for people's specific needs.We 1st find out what'll suit you best:Your weight ( for right e-bike motor system)Your height ( right frame size )Your own individual riding preferences for comfort ( saddle, handlebars , stem , pedals ) and convenience (carriers,bags,gear/accessories)WHAT WE LEARNT AFTER 15 YEARS OF CONVERTING BICYCLES TO ELECTRIC:1. SUPPORTS SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused.Why not turn it into adventures and a new desire to ride again?Make valuable use of something that already exists by upgrading it to an electric bicycle.2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONYour bicycle professionally converted to electric by a team who has over 10 years experience in electric bike building over 30 years in bicycle building and servicing .In 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued using our quality Int'l EU standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.Careful consideration of your weight, height, terrain and riding preferences and with our guidance you get to choose right from the start the power and range that best suits you.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintainand service your e-bike.Your e-bike is compatible with most batteries and bicyle components in the market and therefore when it comes to the time when you need to replace anything you have a wider choice.100% Satisfaction & Money Back Guarantee

text: I'm selling my Huffy. I spent R1600 on the bike, I put in a protective inner lining between tube and tire as well as sealant inside the tubes, it's virtually puncture proof now. I installed a bottle and pump holder and a cushion for the seat. Also bought alloy peddles but when I tried to put them on, I accidentally stripped the grooves on the bicycle arm that hold the peddles. The peddles themselves are 100%. So you need only replace the arms that holds the peddles. Price negotiable. Please only serious buyers. No time wasters.

title: Dual Suspension E-Bike For Sale (NEW)
text:
”Voted best E-Bike of the year: Bicycling Magazine”Darrvin’s design-build prowess on full-display. A dual suspension e-MTB that can keep pace with any of the top brands at an unbeatable price, without giving an inch to performance or quality. Simply the best-buy dual suspension out there.WARRANTY: 1 Year Motor and Battery, 5 Years FrameAVAILABILITY: South AfricaMODEL YEAR: 2023PRICE: Standard R86,495.00 | 2022 models @ R76,495 while stockFEATURESConfidence inspiring MTB frame geometry with 29’’ wheels to smooth the trail.Powerful and responsive Bafang M500 mid motor with 95Nm for added strength.High performance E-Bike optimized suspension fork from RockShox.Ultra reliable SRAM 1 x 11 drive-train with a wide gear range .Aggressive tyres fitted to extra wide rims invite you to get rowdy. With a wider bar and sport orientated components the ROVE packs more options than a Swiss army knife. SPECSFRAME: DARRVIN ROVE Lite Alloy 29er 140mmREAR SHOX: RockShox Deluxe Select+ RLFRONT FORK: RockShox 35 Gold 140mmCHAIN WHEEL: Bafang N/W 36t	CHAIN: KMC E11 Optimised	PEDALS: Low Profile Platform AlloyHEADSET: Headset Tapered Alloy CartridgeHANDLEBAR: Promax Trail 760mmHANDLEBAR STEM: Promax Trail 4 Bolt		GRIP/TAPE: Velo Sport	BRAKE SET: Tektro Hydraulic HD-M290 180mmHUB SET: NOVATEC Boost F & R	RIM: Double Wall 25mm 32hSPOKE: Stainless Steel 13g Black		TIRE: Maxxis Minion F&R TLR 29 x 2.50	REAR DERAILLEUR: SRAM NX 11 Speed	DERAILLEUR LEVER SET R/H: SRAM NX 11 Speed		GEARS: SRAM PG1130 11-42T		SADDLE: Velo Sport		SEAT POST: PROMAX SP2003 350/400SEAT CLAMP: PromaxBUY BRAND NEW, STILL BOXED...E-BIKE OF THE YEAR - BICYCLING MAGAZINE NOV/DEC 2022

Darrvin is a local e-bike company, formed by a bunch of old (er)-school off-roaders with decades of experience in the mountain-bike business. The Rove is their electric duallie ( they also have a hardtail and a gravel bike), and it typifies Darrvin's 'quality and affordability' ethos: a bomb-proof aluminium alloy frame and swingarm assembly, with a Rockshox Deluxe Select+ RL fork and a Rockshox 35 Gold rear shock for 140mm travel all round, driven by 11-speed SRAM NX gearing and powered by a 95Nm Bafang M500 motor.

It comes standard with a 560Wh internal battery, which gave us enough juice for nearly four hours of playing up and down our local trails, albeit mainly in Eco mode. (If you want more range, then a 700Wh unit can be fitted.)

The Rove is not as long or as slack as many other trail-focused e-bikes - you can't simply point and shoot down a technical drop - but the more compact geometry rewards you with a liveliness that's almost gone extinct in modern mountain bikes. It makes the Rove a fine bike for newcomers to electric-assisted trail riding, and a capable all-rounder that's also at home on faster, XC-style trails - or even gravel roads.

title: ELECTRIC BIKES COMPLETE E-MTB BUILT IN S.A OR CONVERT YOUR MTB TO ELECTRIC
text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. And the lack of companies who really care to ensure they match the customers needs with the right e-bike system.  The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. SUPPORT SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You may already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONIn 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued upgrading systems as the technology has improved for motors and batteries . Int'l EU tested standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintain and service your e-bike.100% Satisfaction & Money Back GuaranteePrices From R24,999. text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. And the lack of companies who really care to ensure they match the customers needs with the right e-bike system.  The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONIn 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued upgrading systems as the technology has improved for motors and batteries . Int'l EU tested standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. Scott Fuga Rev MTB Helmet in excellent like new condition, used only a few times. Neat, barely any signs of use.

This helmet retails at over R2.5k!

Description "Fuga Plus 2021 Cycling Helmet"

Perfect helmet for high demands in cyclocross and road cycling. This helmet is characterised by MIPS brain protection system, Halo 3D adjustment system and an unparalleled ventilation. The removable visor changes your look when needed for MTB or road biking.

light and stable In-Mold construction with light Polycarbonate Microshell outer shell

the integrated MIPS protection system absorbs and dispenses rotational forces in case of a diagonal impact Convincing protection from traumatic brain injuries!

very good ventilation thanks to inside air flow channels and large holes in front and back

excellent comfort due to innovative HALO one-hand adjustment system which allows for easy individual adjustment to the shape of your head

bacteriostatic X-Static liner pads

removable visor

reflective sticker

title: EMTB CONVERSIONS E-BIKE KITS CONVERT YOUR BICYCLE INTO ELECTRIC BIKE CHILLED SQUIRREL CAPE TOWN
text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. And the lack of companies who really care to ensure they match the customers needs with the right e-bike system.  The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. SUPPORT SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You may already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONIn 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued upgrading systems as the technology has improved for motors and batteries . Int'l EU tested standard motor + battery systems .3. text:
Tame this 2 kw e fat bike beast and search natures play grounds - beach and mountain trails - in fantastic comfort and all at your own speed.


We can build you a new fat bike or you can send us your existing bike and then we add an e - kit of your choice - 1 000 watt, 1500 watt or the  killer 2 000 watt monster.


The fun and exhilaration of the wind in your hair and the wonders of nature will have you back on your bike again and again!!


Give us a shout and lets put you on your way to amazing adventures and never ending beach rides.


Whatsapp me on 071 811 2907 and we can plan your escape from suburban boredom into natures magic delights!!


Cheers


Michael

title: Explore your dream beach on a fat bike
text:
Take this fat bike beaut anywhere you choose - as long as can dream of a place, you can go there with this fully tested Cape West Coast monster fat  bike - beach or farm roads!
This will be the most fun you have ever had on a bike on your favourite beach or you could fit out your fat bike  for some serious fishing trips.
You can go full crazy and let us fit your existing fat bike or one built by us with an electric motor and battery - ultimate mean beach machine with no limits on your fun!!
You owe it to yourself to join this group of e bike beach roamers who only wish they had done this years ago!!
Give us a call and let us get you out there on the beach where you belong!!

Call or whatsapp Michael on 071 811 2907

title: Fat bike mean dream beach machine
text:
This Cape West Coast battle tested beach fat bike beast is snugly at home on the rugged sun ravaged West Coast shoreline or swaggering along the scorching West Coast farm tracks that only giant Cape Cobras nonchalantly saunter along.
We build the mean machine according to your hardcore conditions leaving you with a beautifully crafted killer machine primed to thrill you and dare you - every time you hit the trail and take on nature's wild challenge - again and again!!
We can turbo boost your adrenaline to Mars with an e bike kit on your existing bike  that will blow your mind - you set the limit and we create the magic!
Give us a shout or whatsapp Michael on 071 811 2907 and we can chat.

title: Mountain e Bike Rocket Beast!
text:
Mountain Bike mean machine -   let your e bike rip up those mountain tracks and explore those farm roads.
Feel the raw power and experience the beauty of nature as your e bike takes you wherever your imagination chooses to fly to.
We can take your existing bike or we can build up a bike for you then attach your choice of e bike kit.

title: 2 kw  E Fat Bike Beach Monster
text:
Explode your fun limits and blow your adrenaline reserves on a 2 kw e fat bike that will fly you to your leisure hideaway's , secret fishing spot's or just ripping along an obscure bush track.


With 40 km and upward range to take you  places at a pace of your choice.


Enjoy the wonders of nature with the eco friendly beach and trail e fat bike machine.


Give me a shout and together we can put together a personal dream machine for your spectacular pleasure and effortless journey seeking nature's bountiful hidden treasures - all at your pace and direction.


Whatsapp me on 071 811 2907 and I will send you all the info and pic's you will need to start your flight into your imagination and beyond!

title: Mountain e bike trail ripper
text:
Super charge your existing mountain bike with a 1000 watt, 1500 watt or the insane 2 000 watt e bike motor that will blast you from your comfy couch into the wild outdoors.


Take effortlessly to the many trails nature intended you to travel - inhale the freshest air with wild abandon and delight in the tranquil beauty of natures bounty - just a hop and a skip from the suburban nightmare!


Be finally free to roam the vast trails, all at your speed and your leisure soaking up the sunshine and atmosphere patiently waiting just for you and your e bike.


We can transform your existing bike or build a new bike into an e bike machine that will allow you to take flight and explore.


Do not hesitate, give me a shout on whatsapp 071 811 2907 and lets get you into those cycle shorts!!


Cheers


Michael

title: Fisherman dream e bike beach  machine
text:
A fisherman's dream fat E bike machine!!
Take your fishing box on your carrier or hook up your trailer and cruise to your secret fishing spot down the coast.
We can use your existing bike or we can build you a Cape West Coast proven fat bike.
There is a wide power range of E bike motors - we can tailor a kit to suit your needs.
Whatsapp me on 071 811 2907 and I will send you all the data and pic's.
Cheers to the most fun you have had on a bike!!
Michael

title: 2 kw beach monster e fat bike
text:
We can supply you with a brand new fat bike or you can let us use your own fat bike.
This 2 kw machine will effortlessly fly you up and down secluded beaches to heavenly fishing spots that will thrill and delight any true fisherman on the lookout for those special hidden gems - just waiting for the serious adventurer to arrive.
Give us a shout and let us propel you on your quest for the perfect fishing spot - all with the minimum of stress and the maximum of fun!
No noise, no pollution, no hassles - just you, nature and the open beach.


We can use a 1kw, 1.5kw or the bruiser 2 kw e motor - the choice of adrenalin overload is all up to you.


Call me now or whatsapp me right away on 071 811 2907 and dive i to a whole lot of fun!!

title: 3KW Electric  Fat bike | Electric Motorbike | Powerful Electric Mid drive
text: Are you looking for an electric dual suspension fat motor bike for riding on beaches or farms? This model e-bike is throttle-and-go. It is for getting to and from whether for fun , commuting, fishing trips or running errands. No pedal assist function as the motor is too powerful for PAS. This model is an electric motor bike. You can exercise with this e-bike in a manual way by controlling the level of twist throttle power if you wish to do some cardio.This e-fatty is powered by a 3kw (3000w) mid drive motor system ( battery can be anywhere between  48v ~ 72v ). Supplying up to 200nM of torque. The current battery is 48v and can be upgraded to 60v or 72v upon request.Current battery: Samsung lithium  48V 17.5ah ( 840WH) h Average range of 50km on medium level of power.Welcome to call or Whatsapp for more info.
